channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 01:35 Air alert in Cherkasy region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🔴 01:35 Air alert in Cherkasy region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Черкаська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 20:09 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now taking place in Chervonogrigorivsk Territorial Community. Go to shelter!
